001package org.nasdanika.drawio.comparators;
002
003import java.util.Comparator;
004import java.util.Objects;
005
006import org.nasdanika.drawio.ModelElement;
007import org.nasdanika.drawio.Node;
008import org.nasdanika.drawio.Point;
009import org.nasdanika.drawio.Rectangle;
010
011/**
012 * Sorts {@link Node}s by the angle of a line between the node center and node's logical parent center.  
013 * @author Pavel
014 *
015 */
016public class AngularNodeComparator implements Comparator<Node> {
017
018        public static Rectangle getAbsoluteGeometry(Node node) {
019                ModelElement parent = node.getParent();
020                if (parent instanceof Node) {
021                        Rectangle parentAbsoluteGeometry = getAbsoluteGeometry((Node) parent);
022                        Rectangle nodeGeometry = node.getGeometry();
023                        if (nodeGeometry == null) {
024                                return parentAbsoluteGeometry;
025                        }
026                        if (parentAbsoluteGeometry == null) {
027                                return nodeGeometry;
028                        }
029                        return new Rectangle() {
030
031                                @Override
032                                public org.w3c.dom.Element getElement() {
033                                        throw new UnsupportedOperationException();
034                                }
035
036                                @Override
037                                public double getX() {
038                                        return parentAbsoluteGeometry.getX() + nodeGeometry.getX();
039                                }
040
041                                @Override
042                                public double getY() {
043                                        return parentAbsoluteGeometry.getY() + nodeGeometry.getY();
044                                }
045
046                                @Override
047                                public void setX(double x) {
048                                        throw new UnsupportedOperationException();
049                                }
050
051                                @Override
052                                public void setY(double y) {
053                                        throw new UnsupportedOperationException();
054                                }
055
056                                @Override
057                                public void setLocation(double x, double y) {
058                                        throw new UnsupportedOperationException();
059                                }
060
061                                @Override
062                                public double getWidth() {
063                                        return nodeGeometry.getWidth();
064                                }
065
066                                @Override
067                                public double getHeight() {
068                                        return nodeGeometry.getHeight();
069                                }
070
071                                @Override
072                                public void setWidth(double width) {
073                                        throw new UnsupportedOperationException();
074                                }
075
076                                @Override
077                                public void setHeight(double height) {
078                                        throw new UnsupportedOperationException();
079                                }
080
081                                @Override
082                                public void setBounds(double x, double y, double width, double height) {
083                                        throw new UnsupportedOperationException();
084                                }
085                                
086                                @Override
087                                public String toString() {
088                                        return super.toString() + "[" + getX() + ", " + getY() + ", " + getWidth() + ", " + getHeight() + "]";
089                                }
090                                
091                        };
092                }
093                return node.getGeometry();
094        }
095        
096        public static Point getCenter(Rectangle rectangle) {
097                return new Point() {
098
099                        @Override
100                        public org.w3c.dom.Element getElement() {
101                                throw new UnsupportedOperationException();
102                        }
103
104                        @Override
105                        public double getX() {
106                                return rectangle.getX() + rectangle.getWidth() / 2.0;
107                        }
108
109                        @Override
110                        public double getY() {
111                                return rectangle.getY() + rectangle.getHeight() / 2.0;
112                        }
113
114                        @Override
115                        public void setX(double x) {
116                                throw new UnsupportedOperationException();
117                        }
118
119                        @Override
120                        public void setY(double y) {
121                                throw new UnsupportedOperationException();
122                        }
123
124                        @Override
125                        public void setLocation(double x, double y) {
126                                throw new UnsupportedOperationException();
127                        }
128                        
129                        @Override
130                        public String toString() {
131                                return super.toString() + "[" + getX() + ", " + getY() + "]";
132                        }
133                        
134                };
135        }
136        
137        /**
138         * @param from
139         * @param to
140         * @return An angle for a line from the parent's center to child's center. NaN if the angle cannot be computed for some reason.
141         */
142        public static double angle(Node from, Node to) {
143                if (from == null || to == null) {
144                        return Double.NaN;
145                }
146                Rectangle parentGeometry = getAbsoluteGeometry(from);
147                if (parentGeometry == null) {
148                        return Double.NaN;
149                }               
150                Point parentCenter = getCenter(parentGeometry);
151                
152                Rectangle childGeometry = getAbsoluteGeometry(to);
153                if (childGeometry == null) {
154                        return Double.NaN;
155                }
156                Point childCenter = getCenter(childGeometry);           
157                double deltaX = childCenter.getX() - parentCenter.getX();
158                double deltaY = childCenter.getY() - parentCenter.getY();
159                if (Math.abs(deltaX) <= Double.MIN_VALUE) {
160                        return Math.PI * (deltaY > 0 ? 1.5 : 0.5);
161                }
162                if (Math.abs(deltaY) <= Double.MIN_VALUE) {
163                        return deltaX < 0 ? Math.PI : 0;
164                }               
165                double ret = Math.atan(-deltaY / deltaX);
166                if (deltaX < 0) {
167                        ret += Math.PI;
168                }
169                return ret;
170        }
171
172        private Node parent;
173        private boolean clockwise;
174        private Double baseAngle;
175        
176        /**
177         * 
178         * @param parent Parent node
179         * @param clockwise If true, the comparison is clockwise. I.e. if the base angle is 12 o'clock then a node at 2 o'clock would be greater than a node at 1 o'clock.
180         * @param baseAngle Base angle in degrees, defaults to 90 if null.
181         */
182        public AngularNodeComparator(Node parent, boolean clockwise, Double baseAngle) {
183                this.parent = parent;
184                this.clockwise = clockwise;
185                this.baseAngle = baseAngle == null ? Math.PI / 2.0 : baseAngle;
186        }
187
188        @Override
189        public int compare(Node o1, Node o2) {
190                if (Objects.equals(o1, o2)) {
191                        return 0;
192                }
193                
194                double angle1 = angle(parent, o1);
195                double angle2 = angle(parent, o2);
196                if (angle1 == angle2) {
197                        return 0;
198                }
199                double delta1 = angle1 - baseAngle;
200                if (delta1 < 0) {
201                        delta1 += 2.0 * Math.PI;
202                }
203                double delta2 = angle2 - baseAngle;
204                if (delta2 < 0) {
205                        delta2 += 2.0 * Math.PI;
206                }
207                int cmp = delta1 < delta2 ? -1 : 1;
208                return clockwise ? -cmp : cmp;
209        }
210
211}
